# system.processes

<SystemTableCloud/>

This system table is used for implementing the `SHOW PROCESSLIST` query.

Columns:

<!--AUTOGENERATED_START-->
<!--AUTOGENERATED_END-->

```sql
SELECT * FROM system.processes LIMIT 10 FORMAT Vertical;
```
